UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the LocalFind application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

ProviderProfile.title: Provider Profile
ProviderProfile.description: Represents the professional profile of a service provider.

name.description: The name of the service provider or business.

tagline.description: A short, catchy tagline for the provider.

location.description: The physical location or service area.

email.description: Contact email address, matches user's auth email.

description.description: A detailed description of the provider and their services.

services.description: A list of specific services offered.

imageUrl.description: Data URI of the provider's profile image.

definition.description: Stores user data. The 'userId' is the Firebase Auth UID. Each user document is independent.
Stores the public profile for a service provider. The 'providerId' is the Firebase Auth UID of the user who owns the profile.
